title: Need For STEM Education
paragraph1: Children will continually face new issues and challenges in today's ever-evolving technology-driven world. Things they learn today will be obsolete tomorrow. It is essential to prepare them to apply core STEM concepts, 21st-century skills and acquire the ability to solve real-world problems themselves.
paragraph2: In India, inadequate STEM education infrastructure, cultural and social barriers and a lack of quality educators are the key issues we must resolve to create the next generation of innovators, problem-solvers and technology leaders.
paragraph3: Join us on our mission to provide access to quality STEM education to every child in India.
